verbose_text: Moreover, increased histone methylation repressed growth factor BDNF (brain derived neurotrophic factor) gene expression in chronic defeat stressed mouse hippocampus, while increased 5-methylcytosine (5mC) in the glucocorticoid receptor gene promoter resulted in early life stress in a rat model.
evidence: histone methylation repressed growth factor BDNF (brain-derived neurotrophic factor
